duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outpatient care and basic to intermediate care for common, non-emergent illnesses and wounds.
Conduct baseline diagnostics and ensure fast turnaround time from exam to discharge.
Offer walk-in service and support referral partners with extended hours.
Manage basic surgical skills for wound/laceration care and basic ER stabilization skills.
Apply knowledge of current techniques to diagnose and treat common injuries, illnesses, diseases, and adverse conditions.

education_certification.credential: DVM/VMD degree or equivalent. AFAST/TFAST training a plus. Basic surgical skills for wound/laceration care. Basic ER stabilization skills. Knowledge of current/up-to-date information and techniques.
